review_blob: Awesome. I think I can detect my favorite hop, Chinooks, somewhere in the bitterness.. somewhat piney, and it;s not overpowering in this brew. A lot of initial spiciness giving way to mostly citrus hops. Decent balance of sweetness to bitterness.

Quickly dissipating head, smells of apple with hints of citrus, taste is similar but citrus dominates the apple, smooth, but disappointed. I have no idea where that apple comes from.. Im assuming the yeast. Its inappropriate, IMHO.
Decent pilsner. Lingering head, good appearance. Aroma of hay. Mild corn flavor with a slight hint of diacetyl which balances it out quite well. Best bang for the buck Ive seen in a while.
